name: Siebel: Don't associate Views to more than 1 Screen
description: This rule reports all Views associated to more than one Screen
output:
This rule reports all Views associated to more than one Screen.
It provides the following information:
- View full name
- the associated values are the reference to the Screen objects the View is associated to
rationale:
Allthough the Siebel client IDE allow this configuration, do not associate a view with more than one screen. If you do this, then problems with the Thread Manager might occur.
When Siebel CRM saves a thread in the session file, it stores the name of the view without the name of the associated screen.
If the user chooses a thread that navigates to a duplicate view, then Siebel CRM always navigates the user to one screen, even if it created the thread in the other screen.
If you define the duplicate view as the default view on both screen tabs, then the user experiences an anomaly in the Siebel client. Siebel CRM chooses one screen tab as the active tab. It never displays the duplicate screen tab as an active tab.
Bottom line in unexpected behavior.
remediation: Review the design and associate one View per Screen
total: Number of added or modified Views
alternativeName: Siebel: Don't associate Views to more than 1 Screen
